parameters.name: HttpPackageConfigurations
parameters.description: A list of HTTP package configuration parameters for this VOD source. (dict) --- The HTTP package configuration properties for the requested VOD source. The relative path to the URL for this VOD source. This is combined with SourceLocation::HttpConfiguration::BaseUrl to form a valid URL. The name of the source group. This has to match one of the Channel::Outputs::SourceGroup. The streaming protocol for this package configuration. Supported values are HLS and DASH.

nested_params.name: Path
nested_params.description: The relative path to the URL for this VOD source. This is combined with SourceLocation::HttpConfiguration::BaseUrl to form a valid URL.

nested_params.name: SourceGroup
nested_params.description: The name of the source group. This has to match one of the Channel::Outputs::SourceGroup.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The streaming protocol for this package configuration. Supported values are HLS and DASH.

parameters.name: SourceLocationName
parameters.description: The name of the source location for this VOD source.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to assign to the VOD source. Tags are key-value pairs that you can associate with Amazon resources to help with organization, access control, and cost tracking. For more information, see Tagging AWS Elemental MediaTailor Resources. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: VodSourceName
parameters.description: The name associated with the VOD source.>

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN to assign to this VOD source.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the VOD source was created.

nested_items.name: HttpPackageConfigurations
nested_items.description: A list of HTTP package configuration parameters for this VOD source.

nested_items.name: Type

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime

nested_items.description: The name to assign to the source location for this VOD source.
